name: Super LoFi Nazi Robot Rumble
description:
My contribution for the ZFX Action XV jam. Control with WASD and aim/shoot with the mouse. Score as much nazi scalps as you can!

There are 4 different weapons hidden in the level. The enemies spawn in waves and become harder over time.

All sprites are hand-crafted with Aseprite.  The sound effects stem from Wolfenstein 3D and freesound.org. The music is taken from incompetech.com.

Have fun!
